title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, it is not clear if the Open/Close project option is available.
EB: Either both options (Open project and Close project) should be available, or neither option should be enabled.
SR: 1. Open the Navigator. 2. Select both P1 and P2. 3. Observe the availability of the Open/Close project options.
